Philippines' says China's maritime-related proposals run contrary to its interestsThe Philippine foreign ministry said on Tuesday it had received several maritime-related proposals from China, but added they could not be considered because they were against the Southeast Asian country's national interests. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 02:13:03 GMT QBXKMLTKABJO3FUGKUD32O5QEE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-says-chinas-maritime-lated-proposals-run-contrary-its-interests-2024-03-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korea's land minister bearish on property as population agesSouth Korea won't see a repeat of the sharp home price gains it did in the past as its population rapidly ages and economy slows, the country's land minister said, vowing to promote public rental accommodation to improve access to housing. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 02:05:58 GMT X75XFTFLZRKMNPDR4WHZ3BRPKU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-koreas-land-minister-bearish-property-population-ages-2024-03-12/Jihoon Lee, Cynthia Kim世界亚太地区
New Zealand says seizing black boxes from LATAM Boeing 787New Zealand's Transport Accident Investigation Commission said on Tuesday it was seizing the cockpit voice recorder and flight data recorder of a LATAM Airlines Boeing 787 after an incident that left more than 50 people injured. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 01:51:16 GMT WNVCH2EQNRL6NL3CJMJYRTVDQE https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/new-zealand-says-seizing-black-boxes-latam-boeing-787-2024-03-12/Alasdair Pal商业航空航天与国防
Ukraine launches drones at Oryol fuel facility, other regions, Russia saysUkraine launched a drone attack at a fuel facility in the Oryol region, the governor of the central Russian region said on Tuesday, while officials in the Kursk, Tula and Belgorod regions also reported drone attacks. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 01:27:22 GMT FEGALDEJN5NANAXPKG7RWFXLYI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-launches-drones-oryol-fuel-facility-other-regions-Russia-says-2024-03-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Man stands trial for Norway Pride gay bar shootingThe trial of the man accused of conducting a deadly rampage at a gay bar in Oslo in 2022 during the city's annual Pride celebrations is set to begin on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 01:05:04 GMT KSNAF5KKYJJ3LO7RPVJIVCQAVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/man-stands-Trial-norway-pride-gay-bar-shooting-2024-03-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Yemen's Houthis target 'US ship Pinocchio' in Red SeaYemen's Iran-aligned Houthis targeted what was described as the "U.S. ship Pinocchio" in the Red Sea with missiles, according to a speech by the group's military spokesman televised early on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 00:47:24 GMT JE5CWUI6NVMUTI72JCUXOVAYYY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-houthis-target-us-ship-pinocchio-red-sea-2024-03-12/Reuters世界中东
Moldova summons Russian ambassador over polling stationsMoldova's foreign ministry said on Monday it was summoning the Russian ambassador for an explanation of why Moscow was planning to open six polling stations in Moldova for this week's Russian presidential election instead of one as had been agreed. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 00:42:42 GMT Z5UFWJPWSVKFLMRUHGTUSSUWJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-summons- Russian-ambassador-over-polling-stations-2024-03-12/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Britain proposes location-based pricing for electricityBritain is proposing a location-based method to determine how much consumers should be charged for the electricity they use, the government said on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 00:03:19 GMT YVEW7DY5UFPD5OUFLT6N2N6HWU https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britain-proposes-location-based-pricing-electricity-2024-03-12/Susanna Twidale世界英国
German court to rule on 'extremist' label for AfDA German court is due to rule this week on whether security services can treat the far-right Alternative for Germany and its youth wing as suspected extremist organisations, a decision that could cost the party dearly in upcoming European elections. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:03:28 GMT JBOMMHJNWZO7XPAY34G2ZWWOPM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-court-rule-extremist-label-afd-2024-03-11/Thomas Escritt世界欧洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy says frontline situation better than in prior three monthsPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Monday that the situation along the front of Ukraine's war with Russia was the best it had been in three months, with Moscow's troops no longer advancing after their capture last month of the eastern city of Avdiivka. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 22:36:39 GMT J6Y5IGPVZZKBHAMVGCWAQHNC3U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-says-frontline-situation-better-than-prior-third-months-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korean delegation meets Mongolian President in rare visit -KCNANorth Korea's Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Myong Ho met with Mongolian President Ukhnaagiin Khurelsukh on Monday, North Korean state media KCNA said, in a rare foreign trip by a diplomatic delegation from the isolated state. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 22:14:47 GMT N3VKPB5QBJMXXC3QJL2HQFB4H4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korean-delegation-meets-mongolian-president-rare-visit-kcna-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
